page.title: 05Park Farm Binfield
page.content: {Park Farm}is owned by Luff Farming Ltd,but it is managed by Mr Row,who has only one other helper.It is{210 {acres}of mixed farm. The farm breeds and rears beef cattle. They have one{Charolais}bull,which weighs 1250 kg.There are 30 Charolais calves and cows altogether.Each cow eats a bale of hay a day and some silage,which costs the farmer Â£100 weekly per cow.There are also quite a lot of{Fresian}heifers.Fresians give good milk and Charolais are good beef cattle,so the farmer interbreeds them. Several fields are devoted to grass, for grazing,silage and hay.In the remaining fields there is{winter {wheat,maize}and{tomatoes. } The farm has three tractors one of them is for backup.This farm is typical of this area.
